intro.description: This concludes our tutorial, so let's review the tools created and let's have a look at the improvements that we can realize.

item.title: Review of the environment created
item.description:
You can now improve your tooling in order to be able to match the generator provided in the solution. During this tutorial, we have only created a small version of the complete web application tutorial, you can use all the concepts available in the meta-model described at the beginning of the tutorial to build a complete web application generator similar to the one provided during this tutorial.
You can also go further with EEF by modifying the models generated by EEF to influence the design of the EEF editor generated for the meta-model.
